meta_description: Celebrating human creativity and furthering the understanding of folk art, craft and design from all eras and cultures of the world.
hours_text:
### Museum & Shop Hours

Monday| Closed  
---|---  
Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday, & Sunday| 10am - 5pm  
Friday| 10am - 8pm  
New Year's Day, Independence Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day| Closed  
  
### Admission

The Entry Level is free for all, always. The Exhibitions Level requires admission for those 18 years and older. A ticket is required for all visitors to access the Exhibitions Level. _**  
**_

_**Admission is free for all on the third Tuesday of every month.**_

Adults (18 years and older)| $15  
---|---  
Seniors (65+)| $10  
Educators, Students, and Military (all with ID)| $10  
Mingei Members| Free  
Youth (17 and Under)| Free  
Museums for All (EBT, SNAP, and WIC)| Free  
  
## Purchase Tickets

Tickets may be purchased ahead of time online or upon arrival at the front desk located near the Alcazar Garden entrance. _**  
**_  
_**Tickets are not required to visit Mingei's Entry Level.**_

  * [ Purchase Tickets ](http://47676.blackbaudhosting.com/47676/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=d3317b0e-bfd4-4409-b2a4-452a5c09c731)

## Free Digital Guide

Take a self-guided tour, hear artists talk about their work, and enjoy expanded exhibition content with our digital guide on Bloomberg Connects, the free arts and culture app.

  * [ Learn More About Bloomberg Connects ](https://mingei.org/visit/digital-guide)

## Book A Tour

Dive deeper into the exhibitions with knowledgeable docents or explore with our self-guided tour options. Docent Ambassador-led [Highlig...

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility Statement

# Accessibility Statement

Mingei International Museum is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone, and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

## Measures to support accessibility

Mingei International Museum takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of this website:

  * Include accessibility throughout our internal policies.
  * Provide continual accessibility training for our staff.
  * Assign clear accessibility targets and responsibilities.
  * Employ formal accessibility quality assurance methods.
  * Follow technical best-practices for digital accessibility.

## Conformance Status

Mingei International Museum is currently working toward full conformance with WCAG 2.1 level AA.

## Accessibility Features

We have implemented the following accessibility features on this website.

### Keyboard Access

We have provided ‘skip to main content’ links to allow direct access past the navigation menu to the page’s main content.

### Text Size

You can vary the text size by using your browser’s text resize option: View – Text Size.

### Alternative Text for Images

All images have been given appropriate, descriptive alternative text.

### Heading Images

HTML heading elements have been used to represent page structure, supporting assistive technologies that allow page navigation from heading to heading.

### Link Text

All hyperlinks should...
